subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT

PARIS HILTON IS IN JAIL!
Paris Hilton is
behind bars, after getting an early start on her 23-day
sentence for violating her probation. She says she's trying to
be strong, but will the experience actually change her? That's
tonight on TV's most provocative entertainment news show.

PARIS HILTON: THE PROVOCATIVE QUESTIONS
How will
Paris adjust to life in jail? What will life be like for her
behind bars? Will it change her? Is she getting special
treatment? Will Paris profit from her time in jail? And why is
she still a role model? Showbiz Tonight has all the bases
covered in a Showbiz Special Report: Paris in jail!

LINDSAY LOHAN -- OUTRAGEOUS PHOTOS!
Lindsay is in rehab, but we're just now getting an idea of
how out-of-control the young starlet was! Absolutely
unbelievable photos have surfaced of her playing with knives.
Plus, is Lindsay's mom going to get her own tv show? The latest
on Lindsay, tonight!

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION OF
THE DAY:
Paris in jail: Do you think it will change
her?
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT. 

SEND US
A VIDEO EMAIL!
Send your response to the Question Of
The Day on video. Look into your camera and tell us what you
think. Responses must be no longer than 30 seconds. To send
your video email, go to cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your video
responses on "Showbiz Tonight" at 11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN Headline
Prime.
